text: Istanbul University () is a Turkish university in Istanbul. The main campus is close to BeyazÄ±t Square in Fatih, the capital district of the province, on the European side of the city. It was founded by Mehmed II on May 30, 1453. == References == == Other websites == * Istanbul University website Category:15th-century establishments in Europe Category:15th-century establishments in Asia Category:1450s establishments Category:Colleges and universities in Istanbul Category:Establishments in Turkey
